lines.text: Dr. Stark, I sense something is troubling you.
Troubling is not the exact word I would use. Amazed, incredulous, mind-boggled... any of those words would be appropriate.
Max, what course are we on?
It's a far out course, Captain, deep into the cosmos and heading into infinity. Hey, I like that!
Why on Earth did they ever make these abusive and emotionally unstable computers?
Remember, a major part of our training was to remain asexual.
a sexual fiend!
If I were attacked by a pack of wild subterranean bush pigs and you possessed the only bush pig blaster in the universe, I would not want your company!
Let's just hope that Dr. Stark is in a better world.
He's in that thing's stomach is where he is!
30 in the a.m. The weather outside is a brisk 200 degrees below zero.

[singing]
I want to eat your face. It could just be so yummy. I'd like to have your face, in my tummy.

[singing]
I want to eat your smile. / Your smile is so beguiling. / If I could eat your smile, / I'd be smiling.

[singing]
I want to eat your knees! / Oh they would really please me. / So let me eat those knees, /Don't you tease me!
Max, can you pinpoint this thing precisely for us?
Not a chance.
Max, don't be a stiff! Now, are there foreign bodies on this spacecraft?
Well, let me see...
[the Creature appears on a monitor]
There he is! Ugly, isn't he?
Max, I need you to do me a favor.
Max has the facts!
Come on, Max, this is no time for you to be a little snot. We're going to need your help.
You want the facts? Just ask Max!
It doesn't want to be called a creature. It's a living organism.
Mayday, Mayday, Mayday! The creature's on top of Jameson and Jameson's on top of me, the inconsiderate shit!

[during a cooking show put on to entertain the rest of the crew]
Welcome to "Cooking with John"... I'm John
No shit Sherlock!

Good Morning Dr. Stark. Check out the observation window for a heavy revelation. This looks like a red letter day for you, Doc. It's an unknown and undiscovered planet and it looks like you discovered it, Doc.
An unknown and undiscovered planet and I discovered it.
I have work to do.
Oh doctor, aren't you going to see the movie with us, you know it really might relax you.
I'm perfectly relaxed. Science relaxes me.
Would you care for some pie, before you...?
Science is my pie. Curiosity is my sweet tooth. Knowledge is my candy. Bye.
Lyrics? What do I care about lyrics! This is an alien organism! You were expecting Rodgers and Hart?
